We have multiple files in module src/ragas/prompt. Need to summarize module responsibility overall.

From file summaries: core abstractions for constructing and executing text prompts with language models, base prompt class, hashable boolean, mutable string I/O helpers, lightweight string-based prompt that formats instructions and retrieves responses.

Mixin adds uniform prompt management features: loading, saving, updating, language validation using Pydantic models.

Multi-modal prompt utilities for image+text prompts, download/validate images, encode base64, generate examples, render as formatted strings or LangChain messages.

Pydantic prompt tools: build/manage prompts associated with Pydantic models, render with dynamic inputs, serialize/deserialize, parse raw evaluation output into structured data, translate statements between languages.

Utils: helper functions for extracting JSON snippets, basic operations on collections of strings.

Thus overall module provides a framework for defining, managing, rendering, and executing prompts (text and multimodal) for language models, with support for serialization, validation, multilingual translation, and utilities.

Business intent: enable developers to create robust prompt templates, manage them, integrate with LLMs, support multimodal inputs, facilitate evaluation and parsing, improve prompt engineering workflow.

Keywords: prompt engineering, language model, multimodal, Pydantic, serialization, validation, translation, utilities, JSON extraction, base prompt, mixin, image encoding, LangChain.
